cyclone.name: KATIA
cyclone.current_location: about 175 miles NNE of Veracruz, Mexico and 185 miles ESE of Tampico, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: tracking slowly westward toward the central-southern Gulf coast of Mexico, well south of the Texas border
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just south of Tecolutla/Laguna Verde, Veracruz, Mexico

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch only posted along the Veracruz coast of Mexico (Cabo Rojo to Laguna Verde)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Cabo Rojo to Laguna Verde; Tropical-Storm Warning north of Cabo Rojo to Rio Panuco and south of Laguna Verde to Puerto Veracruz
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Veracruz and southern Tamaulipas coastline of Mexico
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Brownsville; breezy northerly flow under 20 mph possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the lower Texas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only scattered showers; heavy core of rainfall remains in Veracruz and the Sierra Madre region of Mexico.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would affect port operations.
